HomePage.title: Home page

accountAndAdmin.title: Account & Administration
accountAndAdmin.description: Manage your account and access admin features

templateManagement.title: Template Management
templateManagement.description: Create and manage templates (Must be Admin to access)

planDashboard.title: Plan Dashboard
planDashboard.description: Create and manage projects and plans

HomePage.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

UserProfile.primaryEmailDesc: This email will be used for your account login. It can also be used for password resets.
UserProfile.SSODesc: This email address is managed by cdl.edu and connected to the institution.
UserProfile.notificationsDesc: This email address will be used for DMP notifications. <manage> Manage your notifications </manage>.
UserProfile.aliasEmailDesc: Alias email addresses may be used to help others find you, for example if they‘d like to share a DMP with you.
UserProfile.helpTextForAddAlias: You will be sent an email to confirm this addition

messages.profileUpdateSuccess: The profile form was successfully updated.
messages.emailAddressUpdateSuccess: The email was successfully added to your profile.

errors.givenNameValidation: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.surNameValidation: Surname must be at least 2 characters
errors.affiliationValidation: Institution name cannot be blank and must be at least 2 characters long
errors.otherAffiliationValidation: Other institution name cannot be blank and must be at least 2 characters long

Notifications.title: Notifications
Notifications.description: Configure your notification preferences and email settings
Notifications.introText: Choose the events that you'd like to be notified about from the list below

notificationTypes.commentAdded: A new comment has been added to my DMP
notificationTypes.planShared: A plan has been shared with me
notificationTypes.planUpdated: A plan I'm collaborating on has been updated
notificationTypes.feedbackRequested: Feedback has been requested on my plan
notificationTypes.templatePublished: A new template has been published by my organization
notificationTypes.accountActivity: Unusual activity detected on my account

messages.preferencesUpdateSuccess: Your notification preferences have been updated successfully.

UpdatePassword.title: Update your password
UpdatePassword.requirementUppercase: contain at least one upper case letter;
UpdatePassword.requirementLowercase: contain at least one lower case letter;
UpdatePassword.requirementSpecialChars: contain at least one of the following special characters: ( ) ! @ # $ % ^ & * - _ = + ? ~

messages.passwordUpdateSuccess: Your password has been successfully updated.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordMissingNumber: Password must contain at least one number
errors.passwordMissingUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.passwordMissingLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.passwordMissingSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character

orcidConnection.title: ORCID iD
orcidConnection.content: ORCID provides a persistent identifier — an ORCID iD — that distinguishes you from other users. Learn more at <link>ORCID.org</link>.

orcidConnectionConnected.title: ORCID iD
orcidConnectionConnected.content: You've successfully connected your ORCID iD. Learn more or manage your record at <link>ORCID.org</link>.

ssoConnection.title: Single Sign On
ssoConnection.content: Connect your account so that you can log into DMP Tool via your institution.

FunderSearch.headerDescription: Select the funder to use for this project. This can be the funder you plan to apply to or where you already have funding from. You'll be able to add additional funders later if you have more than one.
FunderSearch.addManuallyText: If your project isn’t shown, you can add the details manually.
FunderSearch.noFunderText: If you don't have a funder yet, you can use the link below to proceed to the next step.

success.addProjectFunding: Successfully added the funder to the project.

PlanFunding.headerDescription: Manage funding sources for this Plan
PlanFunding.fundingLabel: Select funding sources for this plan
PlanFunding.fundingDescription: This funding list comes from the funding list attached to the project.
PlanFunding.changeWarning: Note: Changing the funding sources may require a template change. Only change if you are sure.
PlanFunding.addSourceNote: If you want to add new funding information, you can add funding at the project level. This project can have multiple funding sources, whereas each plan can only have a single source of funding as we match it to the required template.

users.title: User Accounts
users.description: Below is a list of users registered for your organization

organizationUrls.title: Organization URL(s)
organizationUrls.description: You can add up to 5 organization URLs.

dropZone.ariaLabel: Drop a file here to upload

upload.title: Upload your organization logo
upload.description: Drag and drop your logo here, or click to browse

customizeEmailText.title: Customize email text
customizeEmailText.description: The following email will be sent to users when an external system creates a new DMP (via the API) using one of your templates.

OrganizationProjects.title: Organization Projects
OrganizationProjects.intro: Manage DMSP projects and plans across your organization

errors.errorRetrievingProjects: Something went wrong with retrieving projects. Please try again later.

departmentsList.title: Schools/Departments
departmentsList.description: Manage your different departments, faculties, schools or divisions.

deleteModal.title: Confirm deletion
deleteModal.content: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

FeedbackOptions.title: Feedback Options
FeedbackOptions.description: If this is On, users from your org can request feedback on their DMPs. It will go to your organization's contact email which is support@dmp.edu.

options.off: Off - Feedback can not be requested

feedbackEmail.label: Feedback email address
feedbackEmail.helpText: By default this is the organisations contact email address, However, you may change the feedback email address

screenReader.feedbackEnabled: Feedback options are now enabled. Additional fields are available below.
screenReader.feedbackDisabled: Feedback options are now disabled. Additional fields are hidden.

profile.description: Update your personal information, email preferences, and language settings

Guidance.title: Guidance
Guidance.description: Manage guidance groups and texts for your organization

index.title: Guidance Groups
index.description: Manage guidance groups that organize related guidance texts

groupIndex.title: Guidance Texts
groupIndex.description: Manage guidance texts within this group

groupCreate.title: Create New Guidance Group
groupCreate.description: Add a new guidance group to organize related guidance texts

groupEdit.title: Edit guidance group
groupEdit.description: Create a new guidance group below. Select one or more themes to define where plan creators will see this guidance.

textCreate.title: Create New Guidance Text
textCreate.description: Add a new guidance text to this group

textEdit.title: Edit Guidance Text
textEdit.description: Edit guidance text details and content

guidanceText.label: Guidance text
guidanceText.helpText: Enter the guidance text content using the rich text editor

themes.label: Themes
themes.helpText: Select appropriate themes below. This will determine when a plan creator sees the guidance text, for example if they are completing a part of template with the theme of "Data Collection."

messages.noTexts: No guidance texts found in this group

helpText.searchHelpText: Search by research organization, field station or lab, template description, etc.
helpText.funderSearch: Search by research organization, funder name, or related keywords.

descriptions.requiredFieldDescription: Should this question include a warning to the plan builder that an answer is required as a condition of accepting the DMP?(Users will be able to submit the DMP even if they don't answer)

messaging.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
messaging.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
messaging.unsavedChangesWarning: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
